answers.answer: Hi,Diabetes and heart disease can have several common symptoms, some uncommon ones or none at all. They are too many to list here but here are some common ones:Diabetes--increased thirst, frequent urination, frequent infections, fatigue, losing weight while eating normally,blurred vision.Heart disease--chest pain with activities, lightheadedness, passing out.These are often symptoms when either disease is more advanced. the best approach is to have testing to identify them before they present with these significant symptoms.take care.

question: wot are the main symptoms to diabetes an heart disease?
title: Not enuf info
